title: Kalista Ultimate
body:
Does anybody else find this ult disorientating and hence difficult to get used to?  

Also, maybe i am doing it wrong, but  can't seem to be able to refuse to be soulbound.  I understand bot being tethered, but generally  i've been bound I find it rather uncessary screen clutter and distracting  espcially in the heat of battle.  Also there are times when I have had kalista top and I dont want a tether all game but get on e regardless .  

I have even had a troll Kalista tether me then proceed to feed and pull me into the other team !  I feel this should be an ability that both can activate and deactivate in game?  
  
Guess my only options are to "get gud" or gtfo (q dodge), am I right?  

I would greatly appreciate others thoughts on Kalistas Ultimate and tether?

replies.body: They shouldn't have been able to throw you into the enemy to troll, you choose the direction. But yeah the ult is really annoying to use in team fights and just in general.

Yeah this needs to be addressed ASAP. The amount of GRIEFING that goes hand in hand with the same breathe that is MOBA makes this a pretty outstanding issue, a detriment to the maximum potential enjoyability of the game. Yes/no accept with a timer implemented pl0x.
She cant pull you you can just jump back out.
